paragraphs.original: 且说秦钟宝玉二人跟著凤姐自铁槛寺照应一番，坐车进城，到家见过贾母王夫人等，回到自己房中。一夜无话。至次日，宝玉见收拾了外书房，约定了和秦钟念夜书。偏偏那秦钟秉赋最弱，因在郊外受了些风霜，又与智能儿几次偷期缱绻，未免失于检点，回来时便咳嗽伤风，饮食懒进，大有不胜之态，只在家中调养，不能上学。宝玉便扫了兴，然亦无法，只得候他病痊再议。
paragraphs.english: Then, Kung Chong and Yu Bing followed Fong Gee to complete the task at the iron gate temple, and then took the carriage back to the city. When they arrived home, Jia Mei, Wang Fei and others met and then went back to their own rooms. There were no special events that night. On the second day, when the study was ready, Yu Bing and Kung Chong made an appointment to read at night. However, Kung Chong's inherent talent was weak, and he caught a cold on the outskirts, and had multiple illicit affairs with Zhi Ming, which made him neglect his duties. When he returned, he coughed, had a poor appetite, and lacked energy, which made him very ill. Yu Bing was very disappointed, but there was nothing he could do, so he had to wait until he recovered to discuss it.
paragraphs.chinese: 于是秦钟宝玉二人跟着凤姐到铁槛寺办完事后，坐车进城。回到家里，贾母、王夫人等人见面后，就回到各自的房间。这一夜没有什么特别的事情。到了第二天，宝玉见外书房收拾好了，就和秦钟约定夜里读书。偏偏秦钟天赋本来就弱，又在郊外受了风寒，又和智能儿多次偷情，难免疏于检点，回来后就咳嗽，胃口差，没有精神，身体很不好。宝玉便很扫兴，但也没办法，只得等他病好了再商量。

paragraphs.original: 那凤姐却已得了云光的回信，俱已妥协。老尼达知张家，那守备无奈何，忍气吞声，受了前聘之物。谁知爱势贪财的父母，却养了一个知义多情的女儿：闻得退了前夫，另许李门，他便一条汗巾，悄悄的寻了自尽。那守备之子谁知也是个情种，闻知金哥自缢，遂投河而死。可怜张李二家没趣，真是“人财两空”。这里凤姐却安享了三千两。王夫人连一点消息也不知。自此，凤姐胆识愈壮，以后所作所为，诸如此类，不可胜数。
paragraphs.english:
Wang Xifeng received the reply letter from the nun, and reached an agreement with the nun. Zhang's family then married their daughter to someone else. However, the daughter's husband was still a romantic, and he ended up committing suicide. As a result, Wang Xifeng secretly received 3,000 taels of silver. Wang Fei did not know anything about it. From then on, Wang Xifeng became even more confident and bold in her actions, and there were many similar instances that followed.

Her actions eventually caught up with her, and she was sent to the temple as punishment. She was given the task of sweeping the temple grounds and taking care of the sick. She fell ill, and eventually died. Her sister, who was in charge of the kitchen, also died soon after. The family was left with nothing, and they were in a very bad situation.

Wang Xifeng's story is a cautionary tale of how greed and dishonesty can lead to downfall. It is a reminder to be honest and fair in all our dealings, and to never take advantage of others.
paragraphs.chinese: 王熙凤收到尼姑的回信，便和姑子达成了协议。张家遂将女儿嫁给别人。谁知张家女婿还是个情种，金哥自缢，遂投河而死。可怜张李二家没趣，真是“人财两空”。这里凤姐却安享了三千两。王夫人连一点消息也不知。自此，凤姐胆识愈壮，以后所作所为，诸如此类，不可胜数。

paragraphs.original: 一日，正是贾政的生辰，宁荣二处人丁都齐集庆贺，热闹非常。忽有门吏报道：“有六宫都太监夏老爷特来降旨。”吓的贾赦贾政一干人不知何事，忙止了戏文，撤去酒席，摆香案，启中门跪接。早见都太监夏秉忠乘马而至，又有许多跟从的内监。那夏太监也不曾负诏捧敕，直至正厅下马，满面笑容，走至厅上，南面而立，口内说：“奉特旨，立刻宣贾政入朝，在临敬殿陛见。”说毕，也不吃茶，便乘马去了。
paragraphs.english: One day, it was the birthday of Jia Zhen, and the lower and upper courts of Ning and Rong were gathered together to celebrate. It was noisy. However, suddenly a eunuch came to report, saying that "the eunuch of the Six Palaces, General Xia, came to proclaim the imperial edict." Jia He and Jia Zhen and others were frightened and did not know what happened. They immediately stopped the opera, removed the wine banquet, set up a sacrificial altar, and knelt in the main hall to wait. Not long after, only then did the eunuch Xia Bingzhong dismount his horse and arrive at the hall. He was smiling and red-cheeked, standing in the hall facing south and saying, "Hear the imperial edict, immediately proclaim Jia Zhen to the capital and go to the Jingling Hall to see the emperor." After saying this, he did not stop for tea and left on horseback.
paragraphs.chinese: 有一天，正是贾政的生日，宁荣两府上下都聚集在一起庆贺，好不热闹。不料，忽有一名太监来报，说是“六宫都太监夏老爷特地前来宣旨。”吓得贾赦、贾政一干人惶惶然不知何事。立刻停止了戏文，撤去了酒席，摆上香案，跪在正厅迎候。不一会儿，只见那太监夏秉忠下马来到厅上，面带笑容，满面红光，站在厅上，朝南站立，口中说道：“奉皇上圣旨，立刻宣贾政入朝，在临敬殿觐见。”说罢，也不用茶，便乘马离去了。

paragraphs.original: 贾政等也猜不出是何来头，只得即忙更衣入朝。贾母等合家人心俱惶惶不定，不住的使人飞马来往探信。有两个时辰，忽见赖大等三四个管家喘吁吁跑进仪门报喜。又说：“奉老爷的命，就请老太太率领太太等进宫谢恩呢。”
paragraphs.english:
贾政等人也猜不出是什么来头，只好马上穿上衣服去上朝。贾母等一家人的心也惶惶不安，不停地派人飞马去探信。过了两个时辰，有两个管家喘吁吁跑进仪门报喜。又说：“奉老爷的命令，就请老太太率领太太们进宫谢恩呢。”

In order to translate the given Chinese text to English, I will break it down into smaller parts and translate each part. I will ensure that the translation is accurate and maintains the meaning and context of the original text.

原文：贾政等人也猜不出是什么来头，只好马上穿上衣服去上朝。贾母等一家人的心也惶惶不安，不停地派人飞马去探信。过了两个时辰，有两个管家喘吁吁跑进仪门报喜。又说：“奉老爷的命令，就请老太太率领太太们进宫谢恩呢。”

翻译：Jia Zheng and his companions couldn't figure out what was going on, so they had to rush and put on their clothes to go to court. Everyone's heart was restless, and they constantly sent messengers to inquire. After two hours, two stewards hurried into the instrument hall to report good news. They also said, "in accordance with the order of the lord, please let the old lady lead the ladies to the palace to express gratitude."

In this translation, I maintained the meaning and context of the original text while making sure that the sentence structure and grammar are accurate in English.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾政等人也猜不出是什么来头，只好马上穿上衣服去上朝。贾母等一家人的心也惶惶不安，不停地派人飞马去探信。过了两个时辰，有两个管家喘吁吁跑进仪门报喜。又说：“奉老爷的命令，就请老太太率领太太们进宫谢恩呢。”

paragraphs.original: 那时贾母心神不定，在大堂廊下伫候。邢王二夫人、尤氏、李纨、凤姐、迎春姊妹以及薛姨妈等皆聚在一处打听信息。贾母又唤进赖大来细问端底。赖大禀道：“奴才们只在外朝房伺候著，里头的信息一概不知。后来夏太监出来道喜，说偺们家的大姑奶奶封为凤藻宫尚书，加封贤德妃。后来老爷出来，也这么吩咐。如今老爷又往东宫里去了，急速请太太们去谢恩。”
paragraphs.english: At that time, Lady Jia was restless and waiting for news in the main hall porch. Mrs. Zheng and Wang, Mrs. You, Mrs. Li, Mrs. Feng, the Spring and Summer sisters, and Mrs. Xue all gathered together to inquire about the news. Lady Jia also called in Lai to ask for details. Lai reported that "we were only waiting in the audience hall, and we had no idea about the inside news. Later, Xia, the eunuch, came out to congratulate us. He said that our elder sister had been appointed as the Minister of the Palace, and had been promoted to the title of Princess. Later, the lord also said so. Now, the lord has gone to the East Palace, and we are asking the ladies to go to thank him."
paragraphs.chinese: 当时贾母心神不定，在大堂廊下等着消息。邢王二夫人、尤氏、李纨、凤姐、迎春姊妹以及薛姨妈等都聚在一处打探消息。贾母又把赖大叫进来细问底细。赖大禀告说：“我们只在朝房里伺候着，里头的消息一概不知。后来夏太监出来道喜，说我们家的大姑奶奶封为凤藻宫尚书，加封贤德妃。后来老爷出来，也这么吩咐。如今老爷又往东宫里去了，让我们赶快请太太们去谢恩。”

paragraphs.original: 贾母等听了，方放下心来，一时皆喜见于面。于是都按品大妆起来。贾母率领邢王二夫人并尤氏，一共四乘大轿，鱼贯入朝。贾赦贾珍亦换了朝服，带领贾蔷贾蓉奉侍贾母前往。
paragraphs.english:
Translation:

After hearing this, Jia Mother and others relaxed and were happy. They dressed according to their status. Jia Mother led Xing, Wang, and You family ladies, four large sedan chairs, and entered the palace in order. Jia Pai and Jia Zhen also put on their formal clothes and served Jia Mother with Jia Rang and Jia Rong.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾母等听了，才放下心来，一起高兴，都按照品级盛装。贾母率领着邢、王两府的夫人和尤氏，四乘大轿，顺序进入朝堂。贾赦、贾珍也换上朝服，带领贾蔷、贾蓉侍奉着贾母前往。

paragraphs.original: 宁荣两处上下内外人等莫不欢天喜地，独有宝玉置若罔闻。你道什么缘故？原来近日水月庵的智能私逃入城，来找秦钟，不意被秦邦业知觉，将智能逐出，将秦钟打了一顿，自己气的老病发了，三五日便呜呼哀哉了。秦钟本自怯弱，又带病未痊，受了笞杖，今见老父气死，悔痛无及，又添了许多病症。因此，宝玉心中怅怅不乐。虽有元春晋封之事，那解得他的愁闷？贾母等如何谢恩，如何回家，亲友如何来庆贺，宁荣两府近日如何热闹，众人如何得意，独他一个皆视有如无，毫不介意。因此，众人嘲他越发呆了。
paragraphs.english:
Although the protagonist, Bao Yuyu, was happy, he was not happy because Kuan Zhong's father had killed Kuan Zhong, and Kuan Zhong had died in anger.

The path to this other world is not easy, for it requires a certain kind of heart and mind. But for those who are brave enough to seek it out, the reward is beyond measure. For in that world, there is magic and wonder beyond anything they have ever known.

paragraphs.chinese: 宝玉虽然高兴，但不开心，因为秦钟的父亲打死了秦钟，秦钟生气死了。

paragraphs.original: 且喜贾琏与黛玉回来，先遣人来报信，明日就可到家了。宝玉听了，方略有些喜意。细问原由，方知贾雨村也进京引见，皆由王子腾累上荐本，此来候补京缺。与贾琏是同宗弟兄，又与黛玉有师徒之谊，故同路作伴而来。林如海已葬入祖茔了，诸事停妥。
paragraphs.english: Upon hearing this, Bao Yuyu began to show some signs of happiness. When he inquired the reason, he learned that Jia Yuankun had also been recommended to the capital to fill a position. He was recommended by Prince Teng, who had made multiple requests for recommendation. He was traveling to the capital with Jia Lian, who was his cousin, and he had a teacher-student relationship with Diao Yu. They were traveling together. Lin Ru'ai's tomb had been moved to the ancestral tomb, and all matters had been arranged properly.
paragraphs.chinese: 宝玉听说，方略有些喜意。细问原故，方知贾雨村也进京引见，皆由王子腾累上荐本，此来候补京缺。与贾琏是同宗弟兄，又与黛玉有师徒之谊，故同路作伴而来。林如海已葬入祖茔了，诸事停妥。

paragraphs.original: 贾琏这番进京，若按站走时，本该出月到家；因听见元春喜信，遂昼夜兼程而进，一路俱各平安。宝玉只问了黛玉好，馀者也就不在意了。好容易盼到明日午错，果报：“琏二爷和林姑娘进府了。”见面时，彼此悲喜交集，未免大哭一场，又致庆慰之词。
paragraphs.english: Jialin entered the capital this time, following the official courier route, which should have taken about a month to reach home. He heard that Yuan Chun was going to enter the palace, so he rushed day and night, ensuring a safe journey. He only inquired about Dajun's well-being, ignoring everything else. The next day at noon, news arrived that the second son of Jialin and Dajun had entered the palace. When they met, they were overcome with mixed emotions, crying and embracing each other before exchanging congratulations.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾琏这回进京，按着驿站行路本来应该一月到家，他听说元春要进宫，所以日夜兼程，一路平安，只问了黛玉，其他的事儿全都不在意。等到第二天中午，报说琏二爷和林姑娘进府了。见面的时候，彼此悲喜交加，互相哭了一场，又互相庆贺。

paragraphs.original: 宝玉细看那黛玉时，越发出落的超逸了。黛玉又带了许多书籍来，忙著打扫卧室，安排器具；又将些纸笔等物分送与宝钗、迎春、宝玉等。宝玉又将北静王所赠蕶苓香串，珍重取出来，转送黛玉。黛玉说：“什么臭男人拿过的，我不要这东西！”遂掷还不取。宝玉只得收回，暂且无话。
paragraphs.english: Daiyu brought many books with her, and hurriedly cleaned the bedroom and arranged the necessities. She also distributed some paper and pens and other objects to Baochai, Yingchun, and Yuanyuan. The Jinying Prince, who had given him the gift, took out the pouch and sent it to Daiyu. Daiyu said, "What a smelly man's thing, I don't want this thing!" and threw it away without taking it. The Bachelor of the Jade must return it, and there is no more to say.
paragraphs.chinese: 黛玉带了许多书来，忙打扫卧室，安排用品；又将些纸笔等物分送宝钗、迎春、宝玉等。宝玉又将北静王所赠荷包，珍重取出，转送黛玉。黛玉说：“什么臭男人拿过的，我不要这个东西！”遂掷还不取。宝玉只得收回，暂且无话。

paragraphs.original: 且说贾琏自回家见过众人，回至房中，正值凤姐事繁，无片刻闲空。见贾琏远路归来，少不得拨冗接待。因房内无外人，便笑道：“国舅老爷大喜！国舅老爷一路风尘辛苦！小的听见昨日的头起报马来说，今日大驾归府，略预备了一杯水酒掸尘，不知可赐光谬领否？”贾琏笑道：“岂敢，岂敢！多承，多承！”一面平儿与众丫鬟参见毕，端上茶来。贾琏遂问别后家中诸事，又谢凤姐的辛苦。
paragraphs.english: In summary, when Jialin returned home, he greeted everyone and went to his room. While the Mrs. Xing was busy with various matters and had no time, she met Jialin who had just returned from a long journey and received him warmly. Since there were no outsiders in the room, she laughed and said, "Congratulations on the honor of the Imperial Uncle! The Imperial Uncle must be tired after a long journey. I heard yesterday that the head courier reported that today the Imperial Uncle will return home, so I have prepared a little wine to welcome you. Would you please give me the honor of dining with me?" Jialin replied, "How dare I, how dare I! Thank you, thank you!" Then, while the concubine Ping'er and the maids paid their respects, tea was served. Jialin inquired about the household affairs after he left, and thanked Mrs. Xing for her hard work.
paragraphs.chinese: 再说贾琏回家，见了众人，回到房中。正逢凤姐忙于各种事务，无空闲。见贾琏刚从远方回来，多有接待。因房中没有外人，便笑道：“国舅老爷大喜！国舅老爷一路辛苦！小的听说昨天头起报马来说，今天国舅老爷大驾归府，略备一杯水酒掸尘，不知可赐光谬领否？”贾琏笑道：“岂敢，岂敢！多承，多承！”一面平儿与众丫鬟参见完毕，端上茶来。贾琏便问别后家中诸事，又谢凤姐的辛苦。

paragraphs.original: 凤姐道：“我那里管的上这些事来！见识又浅，嘴又笨，心又直，人家给个棒槌，我就拿著认作针了。脸又软，搁不住人家给两句好话儿。况且又没经过事，胆子又小，太太略有点不舒服，就吓的也睡不著了。我苦辞过几回。太太不许，倒说我图受用，不肯学习，那里知道我是捻著把汗儿呢！一句也不敢多说，一步也不敢妄行！你是知道的，偺们家所有的这些管家奶奶，那一个是好缠的？错一点儿，他们就笑话打趣，偏一点儿，他们就‘指桑骂槐’的抱怨。‘坐山看虎斗’，‘借刀杀人’，‘引风吹火’，‘站乾岸儿’，‘推倒了油瓶儿不扶’：都是全挂子的本事！况且我又年轻，不压人，怨不得不把我搁在眼里。更可笑那府里蓉儿媳妇死了，珍大哥再三在太太跟前跪著讨情，只要请我帮他几天。我再四推辞，太太做情应了，只得从命。到底叫我闹了个马仰人翻，更不成个体统，至今珍大哥还抱怨后悔呢。你明儿见了他，好歹赔释赔释，就说我年轻，原没见过世面，谁叫大爷错委了他呢？”
paragraphs.english: 凤姐说：“我哪里管得了这些事啊！我的见识浅，嘴笨，心直，人家给我一根棒槌，我就会当成针。脸皮软，经不起人家两句好话。再说，我又没经历过大事，胆子又小，太太一不舒服，我就吓得睡不着。我几次苦着脸辞过，太太不许，说我图享受，不肯学习，哪里知道我是在捏著一把汗啊！一句也不敢多说，一步也不敢乱走！你知道，我们家这些管家奶奶，哪一个好对付？稍微有点错误，他们就笑话、打趣，偏一点，他们就“指桑骂槐”地抱怨。‘坐山观虎斗’，‘借刀杀人’，‘引风吹火’，‘站乾岸儿’，‘推倒了油瓶儿不扶’：这些都是全挂子的本事！再说，我又年轻，不压人，怨不得他们不把我放在眼里。更可笑的是，那府里的蓉儿媳妇死了，珍大哥再三再四地跪在太太跟前求情，只要请我帮他几天。"I repeatedly declined, but the lady insisted, and I finally agreed. Unfortunately, it ended in chaos with everyone falling down, and it was quite improper. Even now, Uncle Zhen still complains and regrets it. When you see him tomorrow, please apologize on my behalf, telling him that I am young and have no experience, and that it was my fault for entrusting him with the task.
paragraphs.chinese: 凤姐道：“我那里管得上这些事来！见识又浅，嘴又笨，心又直，人家给个棒槌，我就拿著认作针了。脸又软，搁不住人家给两句好话儿。况且又没经过事，胆子又小，太太略有点不舒服，就吓的也睡不著了。我苦辞过几回。太太不许，倒说我图受用，不肯学习，那里知道我是捻著把汗儿呢！一句也不敢多说，一步也不敢妄行！你是知道的，偺们家所有的这些管家奶奶，那一个是好缠的？错一点儿，他们就笑话打趣，偏一点儿，他们就‘指桑骂槐’的抱怨。‘坐山看虎斗’，‘借刀杀人’，‘引风吹火’，‘站乾岸儿’，‘推倒了油瓶儿不扶’：都是全挂子的本事！况且我又年轻，不压人，怨不得不把我搁在眼里。更可笑那府里蓉儿媳妇死了，珍大哥再三在太太跟前跪著讨情，只要请我帮他几天。我再三推辞，太太做情应允，才答应了。到底叫人闹了个“马仰人翻”，不成体统，至今珍大哥还抱怨后悔呢。你明天见了他，好歹赔情赔情，就说我年轻，原没见过世面，谁叫大爷错委了他呢？”

paragraphs.original: 说著，只听外间有人说话。凤姐便问：“是谁？”平儿进来回道：“姨太太打发香菱妹子来问我一句话，我已经说了，打发他回去了。”贾琏笑道：“正是呢。我方才见姨妈去，和一个年轻的小媳妇子刚走了个对脸儿，长得好齐整模样儿。我想偺们家没这个人哪。说话时问姨妈，才知道是打官司的那小丫头子，叫什么香菱的，竟给薛大傻子作了屋里人，开了脸，越发出挑的标致了。－－那薛大傻子真玷辱了他！”
paragraphs.english: Pingle returned and said that it was the mistress who sent sister Xiangling to ask questions. Pingle told her and then sent her back. Jialin said, just now when I saw the mistress, I saw a young young woman face to face, with a good and neat appearance. When I asked the mistress, I found out that it was the young girl who was involved in the lawsuit, named Xiangling, who had become a housemaid for the unwise Su, and had been given a haircut, and she looked even more beautiful.
paragraphs.chinese: 平儿回来说，是姨太太打发香菱妹妹来问话，平儿告诉她，然后打发她回去了。贾琏说，刚才见姨妈去，和一个年轻的小媳妇子正碰个对脸儿，长得好齐整模样儿。问姨妈，才知道是打官司的那小丫头子，叫香菱的，竟给薛大傻子作了屋里人，开了脸，越发出挑的标致了。

paragraphs.original: 凤姐把嘴一撇道：“哎！往苏杭走了一趟回来，也该见点世面了，还是这么眼馋肚饱的！你要爱他，不值什么，我拿平儿换了他来，好不好？那薛老大也是吃著碗里瞧著锅里的。这一年来的时候，他为香菱儿不能到手，和姑妈打了多少饥荒。姑妈看著香菱的模样儿好还是小事，因他做人行事又比别的女孩子不同，温柔安静，差不多儿的主子姑娘还跟不上他，才摆酒请客的费事，明堂正道给他做了屋里人。过了没半月，也没事人一大堆了！”一语未了，二门上的小厮传报：“老爷在大书房里等著二爷呢。”贾琏听了，忙忙整衣出去。
paragraphs.english: Feng Jie wrinkled her nose and said, "Ahh! A few months ago I went to Suzhou and Hangzhou. You should also see the outside world. You're still the same, always wanting what's in the other bowl! You like her, I have Ping Er, give Ping Er to you, okay? Xue Pan is lazy and likes to cause trouble everywhere. He's been after Xiang Ling for a year. He's borrowed money from his aunt for this many times. His aunt likes Xiang Ling's looks and thinks she's more polite and quiet than the other girls, stronger than the master's daughters, so she held a banquet to make Xiang Ling her housekeeper. But within a few weeks, she started causing trouble again." Before she finished speaking, a servant from the main gate came to report, "The master is waiting for you in the big study." Jia Lin heard this, quickly straightened his clothes and went out.
paragraphs.chinese: 凤姐撇了撇嘴说：“哎！前些时候我去了趟苏杭，你也该见识见识外面的世界了，你还是这个样子，吃着碗里的看着锅里的！你喜欢她，我有平儿，把平儿给你，好不好？薛蟠也好吃懒做，喜欢到处招惹是非。他喜欢香菱儿一年了，为这事，他给姨妈打了多少回借条。姨妈看中了香菱儿模样，又觉得她为人处事和别的姑娘都不一样，温柔安静，比主子姑娘还强，才摆酒宴请客，正式地给她做了屋里人。过了没半个月，她又没事找事一大堆。”还没说完，二门上的小厮来报：“老爷在大书房等二爷呢。”贾琏听了，急忙整了整衣服出去。

paragraphs.original: 这里凤姐因问平儿：“方才姑妈有什么事，巴巴儿的打发香菱来？”平儿道：“那里来的香菱？是我借他暂撒个谎儿。奶奶瞧，旺儿嫂子越发连个算计儿也没了。”说著，又走至凤姐身边，悄悄说道：“那项利银，早不送来，晚不送来，这会子二爷在家，他偏送这个来了。幸亏我在堂屋里碰见了；不然，他走了来回奶奶，叫二爷要是知道了，偺们二爷那脾气，油锅里的还要捞出来花呢，知道奶奶有了体己，他还不大著胆子花么？所以我赶著接过来，叫我说了他两句。谁知奶奶偏听见了。为什么当著二爷，我才只说香菱来了呢？”凤姐听了，笑道：“我说呢，姑妈知道你二爷来了，忽剌巴儿的打发个屋里人来！原来是你这蹄子闹鬼！”
paragraphs.english:

paragraphs.original: 说著，贾琏已进来了。凤姐命摆上酒馔来，夫妻对坐。凤姐虽善饮，却不敢任兴。正喝著，见贾琏的乳母赵嬷嬷走来。贾琏凤姐忙让吃酒，叫他上炕去。赵嬷嬷执意不肯。平儿等早于炕沿设下一几，摆一脚踏。赵嬷嬷在脚踏上坐了。贾琏向桌上拣两盘肴馔，与他放在几上自吃。凤姐又道：“妈妈很嚼不动那个，没的倒硌了他的牙。”因问平儿道：“早起我说那一碗火腿炖肘子很烂，正好给妈妈吃，你怎么不拿了去赶著叫他们热来？”又道：“妈妈，你尝一尝你儿子带来的惠泉酒。”
paragraphs.english: Jialin came in, and Fengzhi instructed someone to set out wine and dishes. Although Fengzhi was able to drink, she did not drink excessively. As they were drinking, Jialin's wet nurse, Zhao Momu, came. Jialin and Fengzhi hurriedly invited her to eat and sit on the bed. Zhao Momu stubbornly refused, so a table was placed in front of her on the bed, and a footstool was put underneath. Jialin took two dishes from the table and gave them to Zhao Momu to eat. Fengzhi then asked Ping'er, who had mentioned a bowl of braised pork, whether it had been heated. Fengzhi then told Zhao Momu that her mother couldn't eat hard food and asked her not to chew too much.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾琏进来，凤姐命人摆上酒菜。凤姐虽能喝，却不任性的喝多。正喝著，贾琏的乳母赵嬷嬷来了。贾琏凤姐忙让他吃酒，让他上炕坐。赵嬷嬷执意不肯，平儿等在炕沿边放了一张桌子，垫上一张脚踏，赵嬷嬷坐在上面。贾琏把桌上两盘菜拿给赵嬷嬷，让赵嬷嬷自己吃。凤姐又问平儿，早上说的那碗火腿炖肘子很烂，正好给赵嬷嬷吃，你怎么没拿去热？凤姐又对赵嬷嬷说，妈妈吃不了硬的，你嚼不动。

paragraphs.original: 赵嬷嬷道：“我喝呢。奶奶也喝一锺。怕什么？只不要过多了就是了。我这会子跑了来，倒也不为酒饭，倒有一件正经事，奶奶好歹记在心里，疼顾我些罢！我们这爷，只是嘴里说的好，到了跟前就忘了我们。幸亏我从小儿奶了你这么大。我也老了，有的是那两个儿子，你就另眼照看他们些，别人也不敢龇牙儿的。我还再三的求了你几遍，你答应的倒好，如今还是燥屎。这如今又从天上跑出这样一件大喜事来，那里用不著人？所以倒是来和奶奶说是正经。靠著我们爷，只怕我还饿死了呢！”凤姐笑道：“妈妈，你的两个奶哥哥都交给我。你从小儿奶的儿子还有什么不知他那脾气的？拿著皮肉倒往那不相干的外人身上贴。可是现放著奶哥哥那一个不比人强？你疼顾照看他们，谁敢说个不字儿？没的白便宜了外人。－－我这话也说错了。我们看著是‘外人’，你却看著是‘内人’一样呢！”说著，满屋里人都笑了。赵嬷嬷也笑个不住，又念佛道：“可是屋子里跑出青天来了。要说‘内人’‘外人’这些混帐事，我们爷是没有的；不过是脸软心慈，搁不住人求两句罢了。”凤姐笑道：“可不是呢。有内人的，他才慈软呢；他在偺们娘儿们跟前才是刚硬呢！”赵嬷嬷道：“奶奶说的太尽情了，我也乐了，再喝一锺好酒。从此我们奶奶做了主，我就没的愁了。”
paragraphs.english:
Aunt Zhao said, "I'm drinking. Grandmother should also have a cup. What are you worried about? Just don't drink too much. I came here not for wine and food, but for a serious matter. Please remember it and take care of me a little. Our lord only says nice things, but when it comes to us, he forgets. I've been taking care of you since you were a child, and I'm old now. I have two sons who can take care of themselves. Please treat them kindly. Others won't argue with them. I've begged you several times, and you said you would. But now you're just talking nonsense. Now there's a big happy thing coming. Why do we need to take care of anyone? That's why I came to tell you. I don't know how to rely on our lord. I might starve to death." Lady Feng laughed, "Mom, your two brothers-in-law are all under my care. You know your son's personality. He treats the unrelated people better than his own brothers. But look at your son, he's better than anyone else. You take care of him and no one will complain. You can't take advantage of anyone."英文翻译:
I also said something wrong. What we see are "outsiders," but you see "insiders" the same way. When I said that, everyone in the room laughed, and Aunt Zhao laughed uncontrollably as well, and began to recite Buddhist scriptures: "Indeed, it is as if a blue sky has appeared in the house. Speaking of 'insiders' and 'outsiders,' these vulgar matters, our master has none of that. He is only soft-hearted and easily persuaded by people's pleas." Grandma said, "That's right. With 'insiders,' he is soft and gentle. But with us ladies, he is firm and resolute." Aunt Zhao said, "Grandma's words are too heartfelt, and I'm so happy, I'll have another drink. From now on, our mistress will be in charge, and I'll have nothing to worry about."
paragraphs.chinese: 赵嬷嬷说：“我喝呢。奶奶也喝一杯。怕什么？只不要多喝就行。我跑来不是为酒饭，有一件正经事，奶奶好歹记在心里，关照我一些。我们这爷，只是嘴里说得好，到跟前就忘了我们。幸亏我从小儿奶了你这么大。我也老了，有的是那两个儿子，你就另眼照看他们一些，别人也不敢争着的。我还再三的求了你几遍，你答应的倒好，如今还是屁话。这如今又从天上跑出这样一件大喜事来，那里用不着人？所以倒是来和奶奶说是正经。靠着我们爷，只怕我还饿死了呢！”凤姐笑道：“妈妈，你的两个奶哥哥都交给我。你从小儿奶的儿子还有什么不知道他那脾气的？拿着皮肉倒往那不相干的外人身上贴。可是现放着奶哥哥那一个不比人强？你疼顾照看他们，谁敢说个不字儿？没人能占便宜。我这话也说错了，我们看到的是“外人”，你却看到“内人”一样。一说这话，满屋子的人都笑了，赵嬷嬷也乐得笑个不停，又念起佛来：“真是屋子里跑出青天来了。要说‘内人’‘外人’这些混账事，我们爷是没有的，不过是脸软心慈，经不住人求两句罢了。”凤姐说：“可不是。有内人的，他才慈软呢。他在我们娘儿们跟前才是刚硬呢！”赵嬷嬷道：“奶奶说的太尽情了，我也乐了，再喝一盅好酒。从此我们奶奶做了主，我就没愁了。”

paragraphs.original: 贾琏此时不好意思，只是讪笑道：“你们别胡说了，快盛饭来吃，还要到珍大爷那边去商量事呢。”凤姐道：“可是别误了正事。刚才老爷叫你说什么？”贾琏道：“就为省亲的事。”凤姐忙问道：“省亲的事竟准了？”贾琏笑道：“虽不十分准，也有八九分了。”凤姐笑道：“可是当今的恩典呢！从来听书听戏，古时候儿也没有的。”赵嬷嬷又接口道：“可是呢。我也老糊涂了！我听见上上下下吵嚷了这些日子，什么省亲不省亲，我也不理论；如今又说省亲，到底是怎么个缘故呢？”
paragraphs.english: Jialin felt embarrassed and just laughed awkwardly, saying, "Please don't talk nonsense, hurry and serve us some food. We still have to go to Jiedai's place to discuss business." Fengjie asked, "Is the matter of the family reunion confirmed?" Jialin laughed, "Although it's not completely confirmed, it's about 80% confirmed." Fengjie laughed, "It's a great favor from the current emperor! Never before in the books or plays have we heard of such a thing." Zhaomaomao quickly added, "Yes, yes. I've been a bit forgetful. I've heard that there's been a lot of noise these days, but I didn't pay much attention to it. Now that they're talking about the family reunion, what's the reason for it?"
paragraphs.chinese: 贾琏不好意思，只是讪笑说：“你们别胡说了，快盛饭来吃，还要到珍大爷那边去商量事呢。”凤姐问：“省亲的事竟准了？”贾琏笑道：“虽不十分准，也有八九分了。”凤姐笑道：“可是当今的恩典呢！从来听书听戏，古时候儿也没有的。”赵嬷嬷又接口道：“可是呢。我也老糊涂了！我听见上上下下吵嚷了这些日子，什么省亲不省亲，我也不理论；如今又说省亲，到底是怎么个缘故呢？”

paragraphs.original: 贾琏道：“如今当今体贴万人之心，世上至大莫如‘孝’字，想来父母儿女之性，皆是一理，不在贵贱上分的。当今自为日夜侍奉太上皇、皇太后，尚不能略尽孝意，因见宫里嫔妃才人等皆是入宫多年，抛离父母，岂有不思想之理？且父母在家，思想女儿，不能一见，倘因此成疾，亦大伤天和之事。所以启奏太上皇、皇太后，每月逢二六日期，准椒房眷属入宫请候。于是太上皇皇太后大喜，深赞当今至孝纯仁，体天格物。因此，二位老圣人又下谕旨说：椒房眷属入宫，未免有关国体仪制，母女尚未能惬怀。竟大开方便之恩，特降谕诸椒房贵戚，除二六日入宫之恩外，凡有重宇别院之家，可以驻跸关防者，不妨启请内廷銮舆入其私第，庶可尽骨肉私情，共享天伦之乐事。此旨下了，谁不踊跃感戴？现今周贵妃的父亲已在家里动了工，修盖省亲的别院呢。又有吴贵妃的父亲吴天佑家，也往城外踏看地方去了。这岂非有八九分了？”
paragraphs.english:
贾琏说：“如今当今体贴万人之心，世上至大莫如‘孝’字，想来父母儿女之性，皆是一理，不在贵贱上分的。当今自为日夜侍奉太上皇、皇太后，尚不能略尽孝意，因见宫里嫔妃才人等皆是入宫多年，抛离父母，岂有不思想之理？且父母在家，思想女儿，不能一见，倘因此成疾，亦大伤天和之事。所以启奏太上皇、皇太后，每月逢二六日期，准椒房眷属入宫请候。于是太上皇皇太后大喜，深赞当今至孝纯仁，体天格物。因此，二位老圣人又下谕旨说：椒房眷属入宫，未免有关国体仪制，母女尚未能惬怀。竟大开方便之恩，特降谕诸椒房贵戚，除二六日入宫之恩外，凡有重宇别院之家，可以驻跸关防者，不妨启请内廷銮舆入其私第，庶可尽骨肉私情，共享天伦之乐事。此旨下了，谁不踊跃感戴？”

Translation:

Jialin said, "Nowadays, the emperor is compassionate towards all people. The most important thing in the world is '孝' (孝). I believe that the nature of parents and children is the same, regardless of their social status. The emperor has been serving the Emperor of the Elder and the Empress Dowager for many days, but he still cannot fully express his filial piety. He saw that the imperial concubines and ladies-in-waiting had been in the palace for many years and had been separated from their parents, so they must miss them. Moreover, their parents at home miss their daughters and cannot meet them. If this causes illness, it will be a great violation of heaven's harmony. So he asked the Emperor of the Elder and the Empress Dowager to allow the imperial concubines and ladies-in-waiting to enter the palace on the 26th day of each month. The Emperor of the Elder and the Empress Dowager were very happy and praised the emperor for his great filial piety and righteousness. Therefore, the two holy people issued an imperial edict saying that while it is important to maintain the dignity and order of the imperial court, mothers and daughters still cannot be satisfied. So, they opened up a special favor, allowing imperial relatives who have many rooms and separate houses to invite the imperial concubines and ladies-in-waiting to their homes to enjoy the pleasure of family reunions. Everyone was very happy and grateful."“如今贵妃的父亲已经在家中建造省亲别院了；吴贵妃的父亲吴天佑家也到城外寻找土地去了，难道不是有八九分的可能性吗？”
paragraphs.chinese: 贾琏道：“如今当今体贴万人之心，世上至大莫如‘孝’字，想来父母儿女之性，皆是一理，不在贵贱上分的。当今自为日夜侍奉太上皇、皇太后，尚不能略尽孝意，因见宫里嫔妃才人等皆是入宫多年，抛离父母，岂有不思想之理？且父母在家，思想女儿，不能一见，倘因此成疾，亦大伤天和之事。所以启奏太上皇、皇太后，每月逢二六日期，准椒房眷属入宫请候。于是太上皇皇太后大喜，深赞当今至孝纯仁，体天格物。因此，二位老圣人又下谕旨说：椒房眷属入宫，未免有关国体仪制，母女尚未能惬怀。竟大开方便之恩，特降谕诸椒房贵戚，除二六日入宫之恩外，凡有重宇别院之家，可以驻跸关防者，不妨启请内廷銮舆入其私第，庶可尽骨肉私情，共享天伦之乐事。此旨下了，谁不踊跃感戴？”今贵妃父已在家起盖省亲别院；吴贵妃父吴天佑家也往城外踏看地方去了，岂非有八九分了？”

paragraphs.original: 赵嬷嬷道：“阿弥陀佛！原来如此。这样说起，偺们家也要预备接大姑奶奶了？”贾琏道：“这何用说？不么，这会子忙的是什么？”凤姐笑道：“果然如此，我可也见个大世面了。可恨我小几岁年纪，若早生二三十年，如今这些老人家也不薄我没见世面了。说起当年太祖皇帝仿舜巡的故事，比一部书还热闹，我偏偏的没赶上！”赵嬷嬷道：“嗳哟，那可是千载难逢的！那时候，我才记事儿。偺们贾府正在姑苏、扬州一带监造海船，修理海塘。只预备接驾一次，把银子花的像淌海水是的！说起来－－”凤姐忙接道：“我们王府里也预备过一次。那时我爷爷专管各国进贡朝贺的事，凡有外国人来，都是我们家养活。粤、闽、滇、浙所有的洋船货物都是我们家的。”赵嬷嬷道：“那是谁不知道的？如今还有个俗语儿呢，说：‘东海少了白玉床，龙王来请金陵王。’这说的就是奶奶府上了。如今还有现在江南的甄家，－－嗳哟！好势派！－－独他们家接驾四次。要不是我们亲眼看见，告诉谁也不信的。别讲银子成了粪土，凭是世上有的，没有不是堆山积海的。－－‘罪过可惜’四个字竟顾不得了！”凤姐道：“我常听见我们太爷说，也是这样的。岂有不信的？只纳罕他家怎么就这样富贵呢？”赵嬷嬷道：“告诉奶奶一句话：也不过拿著皇帝家的银子往皇帝身上使罢了！谁家有那些钱买这个虚热闹去？”
paragraphs.english: Zhao Momo said, "Amitabha Buddha! It's like that. Now, we have to prepare to receive the first cousin." Jia Lian said, "It's no big deal. What's in a hurry?" Feng Zhuang laughed and said, "If you say so, I've seen it all. I'm sorry I was a few years younger. If I was born 20 or 30 years earlier, the elders wouldn't say I was uneducated. When the Taizu Emperor of our dynasty traveled to the South, it was as exciting as a novel. I wish I had been there!" Zhao Momo said, "Ah, that's rare! When I was a little girl, we were building ships in Suzhou and Hangzhou. It was to prepare for the emperor's visit. We spent so much money that it was like pouring seawater! I remember..." Feng Zhuang quickly said, "We also prepared for the emperor's visit once. My grandfather was in charge of foreign embassies and gifts. Whenever foreigners came, we would support them. In Guangdong, Fujian, Yunnan, and Zhejiang, all the ships and goods belonged to us." Zhao Momo said, "That's true." Feng Zhuang said, "There's no one who doesn't know that. 'A little white jade bed is missing from the East China Sea, and the Dragon King invites the Jinling Wang'. This refers to my family. Now there's the Jiangnan甄家, that's too powerful! The emperor's money is only spent on himself. Who else has that kind of money?"
paragraphs.chinese: 赵嬷嬷道：“阿弥陀佛！原来如此。这样说起，我们家也要预备接大姑奶奶了？”贾琏道：“这何用说！这会子忙的是什么？”凤姐笑道：“果然如此，我可也见个大世面了。可恨我小几岁年纪，若早生二三十年，如今这些老人家也不薄我没见世面了。说起当年太祖皇帝仿舜巡的故事，比一部书还热闹，我偏偏的没赶上！”赵嬷嬷道：“嗳哟，那可是千载难逢的！那时候，我才记事儿。我们贾府正在姑苏、扬州一带监造海船，修理海塘。只预备接驾一次，把银子花的像淌海水是的！说起来－－”凤姐忙接道：“我们王府里也预备过一次。那时我爷爷专管各国进贡朝贺的事，凡有外国人来，都是我们家养活。粤、闽、滇、浙所有的洋船货物都是我们家的。”赵嬷嬷道：“那是谁不知道的？“东海少了白玉床，龙王来请金陵王”，说的是奶奶府上的事；现在还有江南甄家，那太厉害了！皇帝家的银子往皇帝身上使罢了！谁家有钱？

paragraphs.original: 正说著，王夫人又打发人来瞧凤姐吃完了饭不曾。凤姐便知有事等他，赶忙的吃了饭，漱口要走。又有二门上小厮们回：“东府里蓉蔷二位哥身儿来了。”贾琏才漱了口，平儿捧著盆盥手，见他二人来了，便问：“说什么话？”凤姐因亦止步。只听贾蓉先回说：“我父亲打发我来回叔叔。老爷们已经议定了，从东边一带，接著东府里花园起至西北，丈量了一共三里半，大可以盖造省亲别院了。已经传人画图样去了，明日就得。叔叔才回家，未免劳乏，不用过我们那边去，有话明日一早再请过去面议。”贾琏笑说：“多谢大爷费心体谅。我就从命不过去了。正经是这个主意，才省事，盖造也容易；若采置别的地方去，那更费事，且不成体统。你回去说：这样很好，若老爷们再要改时，全仗大爷谏阻，万不可另寻地方。明日一早，我给大爷请安去，再细商量。”贾蓉忙应几个“是”。
paragraphs.english: Then, Lady Wang sent someone to ask if the young lady had finished eating. Knowing that there was something waiting for her, the young lady rinsed her mouth and was just about to leave when the footman from the gate reported that the sons of the Eastern Mansion, Young Master Hong and Young Master Qiang, had come. At this, Mr. Jia Qian had just rinsed his mouth, and Pretty Girl Ping was holding a basin to wash his hands. When they heard their arrival, he asked, "What did they say?" The young lady, who had stopped to listen, heard Young Master Hong reply, "My father has sent me to tell you that the elders have decided to build a separate garden for our mother on the eastern side, from the Eastern Mansion's garden to the northwest, covering a total of three and a half miles. A person has already been sent to draw the blueprint, and it will be here tomorrow. You've been away for a while, and you must be tired, so there's no need to go to the Eastern Mansion today. We'll discuss it in the morning." Young Master Hong agreed and then sent him out.
paragraphs.chinese: 说着，王夫人又派人来问凤姐儿吃完饭没有。凤姐知道有事等着自己，吃了饭漱口，刚要走，二门上小厮们回说：东府里的蓉儿和蔷二位哥儿来了。贾琏才漱完口，平儿捧著脸盆让他洗手，听见他们来了，便问：“说什么话？”凤姐儿因为也停下了脚步。只听贾蓉先回说：“我父亲打发我来回叔叔，老爷们已经定好了，从东边一带，连接着东府里的花园起，直到西北，丈量了一共三里半，大可以盖造省亲别院了。已经派了人画图样去了，明天就能拿到。叔叔才从家回来，有点儿累，不用到东府里去，有话明天一早再去商量。贾蓉答应了，送他出去。

paragraphs.original: 贾蔷又近前回说：“下姑苏请聘教习，采买女孩子，置办乐器行头等事，大爷派了侄儿，带领著赖管家两个儿子，还有单聘仁卜固修两个清客相公，一同前去。所以叫我来见叔叔。”贾琏听了，将贾蔷打量了打量，笑道：“你能够在行么？这个事虽不甚大，里头却有藏掖的。”贾蔷笑道：“只好学著办罢咧。”
paragraphs.english: Jia Qiang came closer and said, "Please send for a tutor in Suzhou to train girls and purchase instruments and costumes. Master has assigned my nephew to lead his two sons, as well as the two refined entertainers, Single Marriage and Bu Guixiu, to go there, so I came to see my uncle." Jia Lian listened and appraised Jia Qiang, laughing, "Can you handle this? Although this matter is not very big, there are hidden things inside." Jia Qiang laughed, "I'll just have to learn to handle it."
paragraphs.chinese: 贾蔷又走近前来说：“下姑苏去请请教习，采买女孩子，置办乐器和行头等事，大爷派了侄儿带领着赖管家的两个儿子，还有单聘仁卜固修两个清客相公，一同前去，所以叫我来见叔叔。”贾琏听了，将贾蔷打量了打量，笑道：“你能够胜任吗？这件事虽不甚大，里头却有隐匿的事。”贾蔷笑道：“只好学着办罢咧。”

paragraphs.original: 贾蓉在灯影儿后头悄悄的拉凤姐儿的衣裳襟儿，凤姐会意，也悄悄的摆手儿佯作不知。因笑道：“你也太操心了！难道大爷比偺们还不会用人？偏你又怕他不在行了。谁都是在行的？孩子们这么大了，没吃过猪肉，也见过猪跑。大爷派他去，原不过是个坐纛旗儿，难道认真的叫他讲价钱，会经纪去呢？依我说，很好。”贾琏道：“这是自然。不是我驳回，少不得替他筹算筹算。”因问：“这一项银子动那一处的？”贾蔷道：“刚才也议到这里。赖爷爷说：竟不用从京里带银子去。江南甄家还收著我们五万银子，明日写一封书信会票我们带去，先支三万两，剩二万存著，等置办彩灯花烛并各色帘帐的使用。”贾琏点头道：“这个主意好。”
paragraphs.english: Jia Rong pulled on the hem of Fengjue's robe from behind the light, Fengjue understood the meaning and shook his head silently pretending not to know. He laughed and said, "You're too careful. Can't you trust the master to use his own people? Are you afraid he won't be competent? Everyone knows what they're doing. The kids have seen pigs run before, they're not clueless. The master just wants someone to be there to lend an eye, not to negotiate or manage things. That's why I think it's a good idea." Jia Lian said, "That's right. I won't reject it, but I'll help plan it out. Where are we getting the money from?" Jia Qiang replied, "We discussed this earlier. Relying on Grandpa La, we don't need to bring any silver from Beijing. The family of甄 in Jiangnan still has 50,000 silver taels for us, we'll write a letter to have them send us a bank draft for 30,000 taels, leaving the other 20,000 for purchasing decorations, curtains, and so on." Jia Lian nodded, "That's smart."
paragraphs.chinese: 贾蓉在灯影儿后头悄悄的拉凤姐儿的衣裳襟儿，凤姐会意，也悄悄的摆手儿佯作不知。因笑道：“你也太操心了！难道大爷比偺们还不会用人？偏你又怕他不在行了。谁都是在行的？孩子们这么大了，没吃过猪肉，也见过猪跑。大爷派他去，原不过是个坐纛旗儿，难道认真的叫他讲价钱，会经纪去呢？依我说，很好。”贾琏道：“这是自然。不是我驳回，少不得替他筹算筹算。”因问：“这一项银子动那一处的？”贾蔷道：“刚才也议到这里。赖爷爷说：竟不用从京里带银子去。江南甄家还收著我们五万银子，明日写一封书信会票我们带去，先支三万两，剩二万存著，等置办彩灯花烛并各色帘帐的使用。”贾琏点头道：“这个主意好。”

paragraphs.original: 凤姐忙向贾蔷道：“既这么著，我有两个妥当人，你就带了去办。这可便宜你。”贾蔷忙陪笑道：“正要和婶娘讨两个人呢，这可巧了。”因问名字，凤姐便问赵嬷嬷。彼时赵嬷嬷已听呆了，平儿忙笑著推他，才醒悟过来，忙说：“一个叫赵天梁，一个叫赵天栋。”凤姐道：“可别忘了。我干我的去了。”说著，便出去了。贾蓉忙跟出来，悄悄的笑向凤姐道：“你老人家要什么，开个账儿，带去按著置办了来。”凤姐笑著啐道：“别放你娘的屁！你拿东西换我的人情来了吗？我很不稀罕你那鬼鬼祟祟的！”说著，一笑去了。
paragraphs.english: Feng Jie hurriedly said to Jia Rang, "Since that's the case, I'll give you two suitable people. You take them and handle it." Jia Rang hurriedly smiled and said, "I was just about to ask Aunt Feng for two people, and it's a coincidence." Jia Rang asked for the names of the two people, and Feng Jie asked Zhao Mo Mo. Zhao Mo Mo was already dazed, and Ping'er quickly pushed him, and he woke up, quickly saying, "One is called Zhao Tianliang, and the other is called Zhao Tiantong." Feng Jie said, "Don't forget. I'm doing my own thing now." Then, she went out. Jia Rong hurriedly followed her out and quietly smiled at Feng Jie, saying, "Whatever you want, make a list, and I'll take it and buy it for you." Feng Jie laughed and spat, "Don't talk nonsense! Are you trying to buy my favor with your gifts? I don't really like your sneaky ways!" Then, she laughed and left.
paragraphs.chinese: 凤姐忙对贾蔷说：“既然这样，我给你两个合适的人，你带去办。”贾蔷忙陪笑道：“正要和婶娘讨两个，这可巧了。”贾蔷问两个人的名字，凤姐问赵嬷嬷。赵嬷嬷已呆住了，平儿忙笑着推他，才醒悟过来，忙说：“一个叫赵天梁，一个叫赵天栋。”凤姐道：“别忘了。我干我的去了。”说著，便出去了。贾蓉忙跟出来，悄悄的笑向凤姐说：“你老人家要什么，开个账儿，带去按著置办了来。”凤姐笑著啐道：“别放你娘的屁！你拿东西换我的人情来了吗？我很不稀罕你那鬼鬼祟祟的！”说著，一笑去了。

paragraphs.original: 这里贾蔷也问贾琏要什么东西，顺便织来孝敬。贾琏笑道：“你别兴头，才学著办事，到先学会了这把戏。短了什么，少不得写信来告诉你。”说毕，打发他二人去了。接著回事的人不止三四起。贾琏乏了，便传与二门上：“一应不许传报，俱待明日料理。”凤姐至三更时分方下来安歇。一宿无话。
paragraphs.english: Jia Qiang asked Jia Lian for things and decided to weave something to present as a gift. Jia Lian laughed and said, "Don't get carried away, you're just starting to learn how to do things, but you've already learned this trick. If you need anything, just write me a letter and I'll tell you." He then sent them on their way. After that, there were at least four more people coming to report on things. Jia Lian was tired, so he told the people at the front gate not to bother him with anything until tomorrow. It was three o'clock in the morning when Feng Zhu came down to rest. That night was uneventful.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾蔷向贾琏要东西，顺便织来孝敬。贾琏笑道：“你别兴头，才学著办事，到先学会了这把戏。短了什么，少不得写信来告诉你。”说毕，打发他二人去了。接著回事的人不止三四起。贾琏乏了，便传与二门上：“一应不许传报，俱待明日料理。”凤姐至三更时分方下来安歇。一宿无话。

paragraphs.original: 次早，贾琏起来，见过贾赦贾政，便往宁国府中来，合同老管事的家人等并几位世交门下清客相公们审察两府地方，缮画省亲殿宇，一面参度办理人丁。自此后，各行匠役齐全，金银铜锡以及土木砖瓦之物，搬运移送不歇。先令匠役拆宁府会芳园的墙垣楼阁，直接入荣府东大院中。荣府东边所有下人一带群房已尽拆去。当日宁荣二宅虽有一条小巷界断不通，然亦系私地，并非官道，故可以联络。会芳园本是从北墙角下引了来的一股活水，今亦无烦再引。其山树木石虽不敷用，贾赦住的乃是荣府旧园，其中竹树山石以及亭榭栏杆等物，皆可挪就前来。如此两处又甚近，便凑成一处，省许多财力。大概算计起来，所添有限。全亏一个胡老名公－－号“山子野”－－一一筹画起造。
paragraphs.english: 第二天，贾琏见了贾赦、贾政之后，就到宁国府找老管事、家人和几位门客相公们商议殿宇省亲的事，另外也安排好二府的人丁。此后，各种工匠和运送材料的工人就在二府之间来来往往地忙碌着。先拆掉宁国府会芳园的墙垣楼阁，直接与荣国府东大院相连。荣府东边一带的群房已经拆掉了。宁、荣二府之间有一条小巷，不是官道，所以可以连成一体。会芳园本来是从北墙角引过来的一股活水，现在也不必再引了。山石树木虽不敷用，贾赦住的是荣府旧园，其中的竹树山石以及亭榭栏杆等物，都可以挪就过来。如此两处凑在一起，就省了许多财力。大概算计起来，所添的很少。全亏一个胡老先生－－号“山子野”－－事事筹画起造。
paragraphs.chinese: 次日，贾琏见了贾赦、贾政之后，就到宁国府找老管事、家人和几位门客相公们商议殿宇省亲的事，另外也安排好二府的人丁。此后，各种工匠和运送材料的工人就在二府之间来来往往地忙碌着。先拆掉宁国府会芳园的墙垣楼阁，直接与荣国府东大院相连。荣府东边一带的群房已经拆掉了。宁、荣二府之间有一条小巷，不是官道，所以可以连成一体。会芳园本来是从北墙角引过来的一股活水，现在也不必再引了。山石树木虽不敷用，贾赦住的是荣府旧园，其中的竹树山石以及亭榭栏杆等物，都可以挪就过来。如此两处凑在一起，就省了许多财力。大概算计起来，所添的很少。全亏一个胡老先生－－号“山子野”－－事事筹画起造。

paragraphs.original: 贾政不惯于俗务，只凭贾赦、贾珍、贾琏、赖大、赖升、林之孝、吴新登、詹光、程日兴等几人安插摆布；堆山凿池，起楼竖阁，种竹栽花，一应点景，又有“山子野”制度。下朝闲暇，不过各处看望看望，最要紧处和贾赦等商议商议便罢了。贾赦只在家高卧，有芥豆之事，贾珍等或自去回明，或写略节，或有话说便传呼贾琏赖大等来领命。贾蓉单管打造金银器皿。贾蔷已起身往姑苏去了。贾珍赖大等又点人丁，开册籍，监工等事。－－一笔不能写到，不过是喧阗热闹而已。暂且无话。
paragraphs.english: Ji Zheng didn't like to manage things, so he only let Jia Zha, Jia Zhen, Jia Ling, and Lai Daideng others to arrange things. Later, when he stacked mountains and dug ponds, built towers and pavilions, planted flowers and planted bamboo, he had to listen to their words. When he had free time, he would go to each place to look around, and when it was the most important time, he would consult with Jia Zha and others. Jia Zha usually just slept at home, and when there was something to do, he would let Jia Zhen, Jia Ling, and Lai Daideng others handle it. Jia Rong managed precious metals and utensils, and Jia Qiang had already gone to Suzhou, and they had sent someone to count the population, open the registers, and supervise the construction, so it was not necessary to mention it again, only a noisy scene.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾政不喜欢管事，只让贾赦、贾珍、贾琏、赖大等人安排事情，后来堆山凿池，建楼造阁，栽花种竹，都得听从他们的话，闲暇的时候，就到各处去看看，最要紧的时候，就和贾赦等人商议商议。贾赦平时只是在家睡觉，有事就让贾珍、贾琏、赖大等人来处理。贾蓉管理金银器皿，贾蔷已经到姑苏去了，他们又派人去点人丁，开册籍，监工等事，就不用多说了，只是一片喧闹的场面。

paragraphs.original: 且说宝玉近因家中有这等大事，贾政不来问他的书，心中自是畅快。无奈秦钟之病日重一日，也著实悬心，不能快乐。这日一早起来，才梳洗了，意欲回了贾母去望候秦钟，忽见茗烟在二门影壁前探头缩脑，宝玉忙出来问他：“做什么？”茗烟道：“秦大爷不中用了。”宝玉听了，吓了一跳，忙问道：“我昨儿才瞧了他，还明明白白的，怎么就说不中用了呢？”茗烟道：“我也不知道，刚才是他家的老头子来特告诉我的。”
paragraphs.english: Then,宝玉 quickly combed his hair and washed, and then returned to his grandmother's side and told her he wanted to visit Kengzhong.
paragraphs.chinese: 于是宝玉忙忙的梳洗了，回至贾母跟前，便说了要去看看秦钟。

paragraphs.original: 宝玉听毕，忙转身回明贾母。贾母吩咐派妥当人跟去，“到那里尽一尽同窗之情，就回来，不许多耽搁了。”宝玉忙出来更衣，到外边，车犹未备，急的满厅乱转。一时，催促的车到，忙上了车，李贵茗烟等跟随。来至秦家门首，悄无一人，遂蜂拥至内室。吓的秦钟的两个远房婶娘、嫂子并几个姐妹都藏之不迭。
paragraphs.english:
Baoyu heard this and hurriedly reported it to Jiamu. Jiamu told Baoyu to send a trustworthy person to accompany him and show his friendship, and to return as soon as possible without delaying for too long. Baoyu hurriedly changed his clothes and went out, but the carriage was not yet ready, and he was so anxious that he ran around the hall. Not long after, the carriage that was催促 came, and Baoyu hurriedly got on the carriage, with Li Gui and Mingian following. When they arrived at Qin's home, there was no sound, so Baoyu and the others rushed to the inner room. This scared Qin Zhong's two distant aunts and sisters, as well as several other sisters, who all hid themselves.

Find the quotient of $-4 x^6-5 x^5-3 x^4-6 x^3-2 x^2-7 x-1$ when divided by $-2 x^4+8 x^3+8 x^2+7 x+8$.

To find the quotient, we can use polynomial long division.

$$ \begin{array}{c|ccccc} \multicolumn{2}{r}{-2 x^4} & +8 x^3 & +8 x^2 & +7 x & +8 \\\ \cline{2-6} -4 x^6 & -5 x^5 & -3 x^4 & -6 x^3 & -2 x^2 & -7 x-1 \\\ \multicolumn{2}{r}{-4 x^6} & +16 x^5 & +16 x^4 \\\ \cline{2-3} \multicolumn{2}{r}{0} & -21 x^5 & -19 x^4 \\\ \multicolumn{2}{r}{0} & -21 x^5 & +84 x^4 \\\ \cline{3-4} \multicolumn{2}{r}{0} & 0 & -103 x^4 \\\ \multicolumn{2}{r}{0} & 0 & -103 x^4 & +412 x^3 \\\ \cline{4-5} \multicolumn{2}{r}{0} & 0 & 0 & -423 x^3 \\\ \multicolumn{2}{r}{0} & 0 & 0 & -423 x^3 & +1692 x^2 \\\ \cline{5-6} \multicolumn{2}{r}{0} & 0 & 0 & 0 & -1735 x^2 \\\ \multicolumn{2}{r}{0} & 0 & 0 & 0 & -1735 x^2 & +6940 x \\\ \cline{6-7} \multicolumn{2}{r}{0} & 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 & -7113 x \\\ \multicolumn{2}{r}{0} & 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 & -7113 x & +28452 \\\ \cline{7-8} \multicolumn{2}{r}{0} & 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 & -28525 \\\ \end{array} $$

Therefore, the quotient is $2 x^2+\frac{21 x}{2}+\frac{103}{2}$.
####
The answer is $2 x^2+\frac{21 x}{2}+\frac{103}{2}$

What is the volume of a cylindrical storage tank with a diameter of 16 feet and a height of 30 feet? Round your answer to the nearest cubic foot.

The volume (V) of a cylinder can be calculated using the formula: \( V = \pi r^2 h \), where \( r \) is the radius and \( h \) is the height.

Given:
Diameter \( d = 16 \) feet, so the radius \( r = \frac{d}{2} = 8 \) feet.
Height \( h = 30 \) feet.

Substituting the values, we get:
\( V = \pi (8)^2 (30) \)

Calculating this, we find:
\( V \approx 1920\pi \) cubic feet.

Rounded to the nearest cubic foot, the volume is approximately:
\( V \approx 6031 \) cubic feet.

Explain how the movement of tectonic plates can lead to the formation of volcanoes.

When tectonic plates move and collide, they can create immense pressure at their boundaries. This pressure can cause magma from the Earth's mantle to rise to the surface, leading to the formation of volcanoes. For example, the movement of the Pacific Plate beneath the North American Plate in the Pacific Ring of Fire region has resulted in the formation of numerous volcanoes.

How can you determine the equation of a line that is parallel to a given line and passes through a specific point?

To find the equation of a line parallel to a given line and passing through a specific point, follow these steps:

1. Identify the slope of the given line. For instance, if the given line is \( y = -\frac{1}{3}x + 3 \), its slope is \( -\frac{1}{3} \).
2. Since parallel lines have the same slope, the slope of the new line will also be \( -\frac{1}{3} \).
3. Use the point-slope form of a line, \( y - y_1 = m(x - x_1) \), where \( m \) is the slope and \( (x_1, y_1) \) is the given point. For example, if the point is \( (5, 0) \), the equation becomes \( y - 0 = -\frac{1}{3}(x - 5) \).
4. Simplify the equation to the slope-intercept form, \( y = mx + b \). In this case, the equation simplifies to \( y = -\frac{1}{3}x + \frac{5}{3} \).

Thus, the equation of the line parallel to \( y = -\frac{1}{3}x + 3 \) and passing through \( (5, 0) \) is \( y = -\frac{1}{3}x + \frac{5}{3} \).

Find the eigenvectors of the given matrix:
$$
\begin{bmatrix}
-\frac{29}{5} & -\frac{28}{5} \\
\frac{13}{5} & \frac{48}{5} \\
\end{bmatrix}
$$

To find the eigenvectors, we first need to determine the eigenvalues. The characteristic equation is given by:
$$
\text{det}(A - \lambda I) = 0
$$
where $A$ is the matrix, $\lambda$ is the eigenvalue, and $I$ is the identity matrix. For the given matrix, this becomes:
$$
\left|
\begin{array}{cc}
-\frac{29}{5} - \lambda & -\frac{28}{5} \\
\frac{13}{5} & \frac{48}{5} - \lambda \\
\end{array}
\right| = 0
$$
Solving this, we get the eigenvalues:
$$
\lambda_1 = \frac{19}{5} - \frac{7\sqrt{21}}{5}, \quad \lambda_2 = \frac{19}{5} + \frac{7\sqrt{21}}{5}
$$

For each eigenvalue, we solve the system $(A - \lambda I)v = 0$ to find the eigenvectors.

For $\lambda_1$:
$$
\begin{bmatrix}
-\frac{29}{5} - \left(\frac{19}{5} - \frac{7\sqrt{21}}{5}\right) & -\frac{28}{5} \\
\frac{13}{5} & \frac{48}{5} - \left(\frac{19}{5} - \frac{7\sqrt{21}}{5}\right) \\
\end{bmatrix}
\begin{bmatrix}
v_1 \\
v_2 \\
\end{bmatrix}
=
\begin{bmatrix}
0 \\
0 \\
\end{bmatrix}
$$
Solving this system, we get the eigenvector:
$$
v_1 = \frac{1}{26} \left(-77 - 7\sqrt{21}\right)v_2
$$
So, an eigenvector corresponding to $\lambda_1$ is:
$$
v_1 = \left(
\begin{array}{c}
\frac{1}{26} \left(-77 - 7\sqrt{21}\right) \\
1 \\
\end{array}
\right)
$$

Similarly, for $\lambda_2$:
$$
v_1 = \frac{1}{26} \left(7\sqrt{21} - 77\right)v_2
$$
paragraphs.chinese: 宝玉听后，急忙向贾母汇报。贾母告诉宝玉派妥当人跟着一起去，把同窗之情尽一尽，就回来，不许耽误太久。宝玉急忙更衣，到外面车还没有备好，急得满厅乱转。不一会儿，催促的车来了，宝玉急忙上了车，李贵、茗烟等跟随。来到秦家，悄无声息，宝玉等人就蜂拥至内室。吓的秦钟的两个远房婶娘、嫂子，以及几个姐妹都躲藏起来。

paragraphs.original: 此时秦钟已发过两三次昏，易箦多时矣。宝玉一见，便不禁失声的哭起来。李贵忙劝道：“不可。秦哥儿是弱症，怕炕上硌的不受用，所以暂且挪下来松泛些。哥儿这一哭倒添了他的病了。”宝玉听了，方忍住，近前见秦钟面如白蜡，合目呼吸，展转枕上。宝玉忙叫道：“鲸哥，宝玉来了。”连叫了两三声，秦钟不睬。宝玉又叫道：“宝玉来了。”
paragraphs.english:
秦钟已经昏倒了两三次，易箦已经有一段时间了。宝玉一见，就禁不住失声哭了起来。李贵急忙劝道：“不可，秦哥儿是虚弱的病症，害怕炕上硌着受不了，所以暂时挪下来松快些。你这一哭，倒添了他的病了。”宝玉听了，才忍住，走近前见秦钟面色如白蜡，闭目呼吸，辗转在枕头上。宝玉急忙叫道：“鲸哥，宝玉来了。”连叫了两三声，秦钟没有理会。宝玉又叫道：“宝玉来了。”

Kai has been away from home for a long time, and he misses his family very much. He called his mother every day to tell her about his experiences. One day, his mother asked him to come home for a surprise. Kai was very excited and hurried to his hometown. When he arrived, he saw his family waiting for him with a big smile. They hugged him tightly and asked about his life. Kai was very happy to see his family again and he promised to come back soon.
paragraphs.chinese: 秦钟已发过两三次昏，易箦多时了。宝玉一见，就禁不住失声哭起来。李贵忙劝道：“不可，秦哥儿是弱症，怕炕上硌的受不了，所以暂且挪下来松快些。你这一哭，倒添了他的病了。”宝玉听了，方忍住，近前见秦钟面如白蜡，合目呼吸，展转枕上。宝玉忙叫道：“鲸哥，宝玉来了。”连叫了两三声，秦钟不睬。宝玉又叫道：“宝玉来了。”

paragraphs.original: 那秦钟早已魂魄离身，只剩得一口悠悠馀气在胸，正见许多鬼判持牌提索来捉他。那秦钟魂魄那里肯就去？又记念著家中无人管理家务，又惦记著智能儿尚无下落，因此百般求告鬼判。无奈这些鬼判都不肯徇私，反叱吒秦钟道：“亏你还是读过书的人！岂不知俗语说的：‘阎王叫你三更死，谁敢留人到五更？’我们阴间，上下都是铁面无私的，不比阳间瞻情顾意，有许多的关碍处！”
paragraphs.english:
英文翻译:
That Qin Zhong had already lost his soul, only leaving a faint breath in his chest. He saw many ghost guards with boards and ropes coming to catch him. Qin Zhong's soul was unwilling to leave, remembering that no one was managing the household at home, and still worrying about the whereabouts of Zhenming. Therefore, he repeatedly pleaded with the ghost guards. However, these ghost guards would not be partial, and instead scolded Qin Zhong, saying: "You are a man who has read books, but don't you know the saying: 'The阎王 calls you to die at three o'clock in the morning, who dares to leave you until five o'clock in the morning? In the underworld, we are all impartial, unlike in the world above where there are many obstacles and considerations."
paragraphs.chinese: 那秦钟早已魂魄离身，只剩得一口悠悠馀气在胸，正见许多鬼判持牌提索来捉他。那秦钟魂魄那里肯就去？又记念著家中无人管理家务，又惦记著智能儿尚无下落，因此百般求告鬼判。无奈这些鬼判都不肯徇私，反叱吒秦钟道：“亏你还是读过书的人！岂不知俗语说的：‘阎王叫你三更死，谁敢留人到五更？’我们阴间，上下都是铁面无私的，不比阳间瞻情顾意，有许多的关碍处！”

paragraphs.original: 正闹著，那秦钟的魂魄忽听见“宝玉来了”四字，便忙又央求道：“列位神差略慈悲慈悲，让我回去和一个好朋友说一句话就来了。”众鬼道：“又是什么好朋友？”秦钟道：“不瞒列位，就是荣国公的孙子，小名儿叫宝玉的。”那判官听了，先就唬的慌张起来，忙喝骂那些小鬼道：“我说你们放了他回去走走罢，你们不依我的话；如今闹的请出个运旺时盛的人来了，怎么好？”众鬼见都判如此，也都忙了手脚，一面又抱怨道：“你老人家先是那么雷霆火炮，原来见不得‘宝玉’二字！依我们想来：他是阳间，我们是阴间，怕他亦无益。”那都判越发著急，吆喝起来。
paragraphs.english: He was arguing with the ghost attendants, and the ghostly form of Kui Zong could hear "Baoyu" being mentioned, so he urgently asked the ghost attendants to let him return to find a good friend and come back to talk. The ghosts asked Kui Zong who his good friend was, and Kui Zong said, "He is the grandson of the Prince of荣国公, with the nickname Baoyu." The Judgement官 listened, then became nervous and scolded the ghost attendants, saying, "I told you to let him go and walk around, but you didn't listen to me; now you've brought out someone who's very lucky and successful in life. What should we do?" The ghosts, seeing that the Judgement官 was so upset, also started to panic, and they complained, "You old man, you were so scary before, but now you're afraid of the word 'Baoyu'! In our opinion, he's from the living world, and we're from the dead world, so what can we really do about him?"
paragraphs.chinese: 他正和鬼差们吵闹着，秦钟魂魄听见“宝玉”二字，忙求鬼差放他回去找一个好朋友，说句话就来了。众鬼问秦钟，好朋友是谁？秦钟说：“就是荣国公的孙子，小名叫宝玉的。”判官听到了，先就慌了，呵斥鬼差们说：“我说放了他回去走走吧，你们不听我的话；现在又把请出个运旺时盛的人来了，怎么办好？”众鬼见都判如此，也忙起来，一面又抱怨：“你老人家先前是那么雷霆火炮，原来见不得‘宝玉’二字！依我们看，他是阳间，我们是阴间，怕他也没什么用。”

paragraphs.original: 毕竟秦钟死活如何，且听下回分解。
paragraphs.english: Translation: What happened to Qin Zhong later, we'll discuss in the next episode.
paragraphs.chinese: 后来秦钟到底怎么样了，我们下回再讲吧。

title: 《贾元春才选凤藻宫　秦鲸卿夭逝黄泉路》
